Method Detail

getSender

public String getSender()
Description copied from interface: SMTPDeliveryEnvelope
Return the sender which should be used for the MAIL FROM. This may return null if a null-sender should be used

Specified by:
getSender in interface SMTPDeliveryEnvelope
Returns:
sender

getRecipients

public Collection<String> getRecipients()
Description copied from interface: SMTPDeliveryEnvelope
Return a Collection of recipients which should be used for the RCPT TO. The returned Collection must at least contain one element.

The returned Collection is unmodifiable

Specified by:
getRecipients in interface SMTPDeliveryEnvelope
Returns:
recipients not null
